slide-1.title: 12D Thunder
content: 12D Thunder comes with a new bonus system. Join the exciting game and win bonuses up to 500x your bet! Let the lightning bring you big wins!

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: 12D Thunder is a game where you guess the number where the ball stops on the 12D board. There are 1 jackpot and 12 numbers in red and black colors.

slide-3.title: Thunder Bonus
content: Lightning will strike 1 to 5 spots on the 12D board randomly. If the ball stops exactly on a Thunder spot, you have the chance to win a Thunder Bonus of 20x to 500x your bet.
